Title: Jarrapellejos
Writer: Antonio Giménez Rico, Manuel Gutiérrez Aragón, Felipe Trigo (novel)
Actors: Antonio Ferrandis, Juan Diego, Lydia Bosch, Amparo Larrañaga
Plot: In La Joya, Extremadura in 1912 a local leader : Pedro Luis Jarrapellejos has the power . Two of his followers committed a horrible crime and it makes every effort to conceal the guilt of them.
